https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5TrgoMsE48V2vmho7mSz0u5J4DC.jpg Every summer, most of the families of the village don't leave on holidays. Gathered in small groups, kids organize themselves to take advantage of these long boring days. Boredom Killer
